description: Source code implementing JSON parsing functions for OvsDbApi, including table parsing and specific configuration parsers for gateway and feedback configurations. Contains functions for parsing JSON data, managing memory, and setting configuration structures based on JSON content.

methods.name: OVS_STATUS parse_table(const char * table_name,json_t * update,Rdkb_Table_Config * table_config)
methods.description: Main function to parse a table given its name and JSON update, delegating to specific parsers.

methods.name: OVS_STATUS gateway_config_parser(json_t * json,Rdkb_Table_Config * table_config)
methods.description: Parses JSON configuration for gateway settings into a Gateway_Config structure.

methods.name: OVS_STATUS feedback_config_parser(json_t * json,Rdkb_Table_Config * table_config)
methods.description: Parses JSON configuration for feedback settings into a Feedback structure.

methods.name: const char * json_fetch_string(json_t * root,const char * key)
methods.description: Helper function to fetch a string value from JSON object by key.

ctags.name: json_fetch_string
ctags.pattern: /^static const char * json_fetch_string(json_t * root, const char *key)$/

ctags.name: parse_table
ctags.pattern: /^OVS_STATUS parse_table(const char * table_name, json_t* update, Rdkb_Table_Config* table_config)$/
